name: resume
paragraph: College graduate with a Bachelor of Science (B.S.) in Computer Information Technology (4.0) with 5+ years of work experience.  Strong Experience using front-end technologies like Angular, React, Webpack, HTML5, CSS3/Sass, JavaScript, Lottie Animations, JSON. Can work equally well in highly collaborative settings as well as those with little direction. Praised as diligent by my peers, I can be relied upon to help your company achieve its goals

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (B.S.) Computer Information Technology (May 2019)

relevant: Windows Application Development Using Html5 And JavaScript

bullets: Involved in developing UI pages using Angular and React.
Worked in a highly collaborative agile team environment.
Conducted training with junior personnel and clients.
Successfully optimized web applications for performance and scalability, resulting in faster load times and enhanced responsiveness.
Integrated with backend APIs and effectively utilized data from RESTful services to enhance application functionality
experience.title: SENIOR FRONTEND DEVELOPER

bullets: Analyze user needs to determine technical requirements.
Create designs, concepts, and sample layouts based on knowledge of layout principles and esthetic design concepts.
Design, build, or maintain web sites, using authoring or scripting languages, content creation tools, management tools, and digital media.
Conduct trial runs of programs and software applications to be sure they will produce the desired information and that the instructions are correct.
experience.title: OWNER OPERATOR / PWA BUILDER

bullets: Streamline data entry to cut entry time by over 75% with VBA in Microsoft Excel.
Train other staff members to perform work activities, such as using computer applications.
Design, build, or maintain web sites, using authoring or scripting languages, content creation tools, management tools, and digital media.
Conduct trial runs of programs and software applications to be sure they will produce the desired information and that the instructions are correct.
experience.title: OFFICE CLERK

bullets: Test and troubleshoot instruments, components, and assemblies.
Keep records of maintenance and repair work.
Adjust, repair, or replace malfunctions components.
experience.title: Aviation Electrician

name: readme
paragraph: Welcome to my web developer portfolio website! I am thrilled to have the opportunity to showcase my skills, expertise, and passion for web development. Throughout my journey as a web developer, I have honed my abilities in various programming languages, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and several frameworks like React and Angular. From crafting responsive and mobile-friendly designs to optimizing website performance and implementing efficient algorithms, I take pride in delivering high-quality solutions that meet both user and client expectations.
